name: ContinuousMap.le_def
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝ : PartialOrder β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Iff (LE.le f g) (∀ (a : α), LE.le (f a) (g a))
decl:
theorem le_def [PartialOrder β] {f g : C(α, β)} : f ≤ g ↔ ∀ a, f a ≤ g a :=
  Pi.le_def

name: ContinuousMap.lt_def
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝ : PartialOrder β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Iff (LT.lt f g) (And (∀ (a : α), LE.le (f a) (g a)) (Exists fun a => LT.lt (f a) (g a)))
decl:
theorem lt_def [PartialOrder β] {f g : C(α, β)} : f < g ↔ (∀ a, f a ≤ g a) ∧ ∃ a, f a < g a :=
  Pi.lt_def

name: ContinuousMap.coe_sup
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup β
inst✝ : ContinuousSup β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(Max.max f g)) (Max.max ⇑f ⇑g)
decl: @[simp, norm_cast] lemma coe_sup (f g : C(α, β)) : ⇑(f ⊔ g) = ⇑f ⊔ g := rfl

name: ContinuousMap.sup_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup β
inst✝ : ContinuousSup β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
a : α
⊢ Eq ((Max.max f g) a) (Max.max (f a) (g a))
decl: @[simp] lemma sup_apply (f g : C(α, β)) (a : α) : (f ⊔ g) a = f a ⊔ g a := rfl

name: ContinuousMap.sup'_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup β
inst✝ : ContinuousSup β
ι : Type u_3
s : Finset ι
H : s.Nonempty
f : ι → ContinuousMap α β
a : α
⊢ Eq ((s.sup' H f) a) (s.sup' H fun i => (f i) a)
decl:
lemma sup'_apply {ι : Type*} {s : Finset ι} (H : s.Nonempty) (f : ι → C(α, β)) (a : α) :
    s.sup' H f a = s.sup' H fun i ↦ f i a :=
  Finset.comp_sup'_eq_sup'_comp H (fun g : C(α, β) ↦ g a) fun _ _ ↦ rfl

name: ContinuousMap.coe_sup'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeSup β
inst✝ : ContinuousSup β
ι : Type u_3
s : Finset ι
H : s.Nonempty
f : ι → ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(s.sup' H f)) (s.sup' H fun i => ⇑(f i))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma coe_sup' {ι : Type*} {s : Finset ι} (H : s.Nonempty) (f : ι → C(α, β)) :
    ⇑(s.sup' H f) = s.sup' H fun i ↦ ⇑(f i) := by ext; simp [sup'_apply]

name: ContinuousMap.coe_inf
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf β
inst✝ : ContinuousInf β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(Min.min f g)) (Min.min ⇑f ⇑g)
decl: @[simp, norm_cast] lemma coe_inf (f g : C(α, β)) : ⇑(f ⊓ g) = ⇑f ⊓ g := rfl

name: ContinuousMap.inf_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf β
inst✝ : ContinuousInf β
f g : ContinuousMap α β
a : α
⊢ Eq ((Min.min f g) a) (Min.min (f a) (g a))
decl: @[simp] lemma inf_apply (f g : C(α, β)) (a : α) : (f ⊓ g) a = f a ⊓ g a := rfl

name: ContinuousMap.inf'_apply
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf β
inst✝ : ContinuousInf β
ι : Type u_3
s : Finset ι
H : s.Nonempty
f : ι → ContinuousMap α β
a : α
⊢ Eq ((s.inf' H f) a) (s.inf' H fun i => (f i) a)
decl:
lemma inf'_apply {ι : Type*} {s : Finset ι} (H : s.Nonempty) (f : ι → C(α, β)) (a : α) :
    s.inf' H f a = s.inf' H fun i ↦ f i a :=
  Finset.comp_inf'_eq_inf'_comp H (fun g : C(α, β) ↦ g a) fun _ _ ↦ rfl

name: ContinuousMap.coe_inf'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : SemilatticeInf β
inst✝ : ContinuousInf β
ι : Type u_3
s : Finset ι
H : s.Nonempty
f : ι → ContinuousMap α β
⊢ Eq (⇑(s.inf' H f)) (s.inf' H fun i => ⇑(f i))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
lemma coe_inf' {ι : Type*} {s : Finset ι} (H : s.Nonempty) (f : ι → C(α, β)) :
    ⇑(s.inf' H f) = s.inf' H fun i ↦ ⇑(f i) := by ext; simp [inf'_apply]

name: ContinuousMap.coe_IccExtend
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝² : TopologicalSpace β
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder α
inst✝ : OrderTopology α
a b : α
h : LE.le a b
f : ContinuousMap (↑(Set.Icc a b)) β
⊢ Eq (⇑(ContinuousMap.IccExtend h f)) (Set.IccExtend h ⇑f)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_IccExtend (f : C(Set.Icc a b, β)) :
    ((IccExtend h f : C(α, β)) : α → β) = Set.IccExtend h f :=
  rfl
